comment: I had a great experience buying a car from this dealership. The staff was friendly and knowledgeable, and they helped me find the perfect car for my needs. The whole process was smooth and efficient.

I couldn't be happier with the car I purchased from this dealership. The quality of service and the wide range of car options were impressive. I highly recommend this place to anyone in the market for a new car.
The sales team was helpful, but the finance department tried to upsell me on unnecessary add-ons. Overall, it was a decent experience, but I wish they were more transparent about the costs.
